check_box.label: Auto-complete gestures in Local Chat
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether the Viewer should attempt to automatically complete gesture names when writing into local chat or not.
check_box.name: ChatAutocompleteGestures

check_box.label: Hide Local Chat window on focus loss
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether local chat should be closed (hidden) whenever it loses focus or not. In combination with the 'Deselect Local Chat' option this will automatically close local chat after sending a message.
check_box.name: EnableAutohidingChat

check_box.label: Disable multi-line in Chat and IM
check_box.tool_tip: This option forces all chat bars to remain single line text fields regardless of if your message is longer than the text field or if you are copying multi-line text into the chat bar.
check_box.name: ForceChatSingleLineMode

check_box.label: Allow one-click TP on SLURL's in Chat
check_box.tool_tip: This option allows teleporting via SLURL's in chat without opening the 'Places' window first.
check_box.name: SLURLTeleportDirectly

check_box.label: Play typing animation and sound when chatting
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether you and others can see and hear you play a typing animation as long as you are actively typing a message in local chat.
check_box.name: play_typing_animation

check_box.label: Play 'New Conversation' Sound
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether a sound should be played whenever a new conversation is started.
check_box.name: new_conversation

check_box.label: Play 'Incoming Voice Call' Sound
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether a sound should be played whenever you are asked to join a voice call.
check_box.name: incoming_voice_call

check_box.label: Play 'Teleport Offer' Sound
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether a sound should be played whenever a teleport is offered to you.
check_box.name: teleport_offer

check_box.label: Play 'Inventory Offer' Sound
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether a sound should be played whenever an inventory item is offered to you.
check_box.name: inventory_offer

check_box.label: Return deselects chatbar
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether the chatbar both in local and IM/Groupchat should be deselected after hitting return (sending a message) or not. In combination with 'Hide Local Chat window on focus loss' this will do the same as the 'Hide Local Chat' option.
check_box.name: CloseChatOnReturn

check_box.label: Return hides Local Chat window
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether the local chat should be closed (hidden) after hitting return (sending a message) or not. This option imitates a chat behavior similar to old Viewers and will only work if local chat is separated and collapsed to a chat bar.
check_box.name: AutohideChatbar

check_box.label: Allow MU* pose style in Local Chat and IM
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether ':' at the start of a chat message will turn into '/me' style emoting when send or not.
check_box.name: AllowMUpose

check_box.label: Auto-close OOC chat (i.e. add '))')
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether Out-Of-Character chat should be closed automatically or not. This option will close all your '((' and '(' chat parts automatically at the end when sending a message.
check_box.name: AutoCloseOOC

check_box.label: Play chatting animation when sending in Local Chat
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of the head bobbing animation when sending a message in local chat.
check_box.name: play_chat_animation

check_box.label: Log in system chat whenever an inventory offer is declined
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether any declined inventory offers should be logged to the corresponding conversation tab or not.
check_box.name: log_inventory_chat

check_box.label: Show a part of the last conversation in history if available
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether a snipped of the last conversation should be displayed in a conversation tab.
check_box.name: log_show_history

radio_item.label: Nothing
radio_item.tool_tip: This option disables saving any logs or transcripts.
radio_item.name: Nothing

radio_item.label: Logs
radio_item.tool_tip: This option limits the Viewer to saving only logs of conversations.
radio_item.name: Logs

radio_item.label: Logs and Transcripts
radio_item.tool_tip: This option allows the Viewer to save all logs and transcripts of conversations.
radio_item.name: LogsTranscripts

check_box.label: Disable new-style name titles in IM
check_box.tool_tip: This option disables the new chat history name titles acting as separator for different avatars chatting. This option imitates a chat behavior similar to old Viewers.
check_box.name: plain_text_chat_history

check_box.label: Switch IM tabs to the left side
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether the IM tabs should be shown on the left or right side in the Conversation window. ||<icon>Caution_Widget_Mini</icon> Caution Badge |Changing this option needs a restart.
check_box.name: IMWindowSwitchSide

check_box.label: Show script errors when they happen
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of script errors.
check_box.name: show_script_errors

radio_item.label: Chat
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets script errors to appear in local chat as red text warning rather than in an extra window.

radio_item.label: Error Window
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets script errors to appear in a separate window rather than as red text in local chat.

radio_item.label: Small
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets the chat font size to small.

radio_item.label: Medium
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets the chat font size to medium. This is the default option.

radio_item.label: Large
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets the chat font size to large. Useful for large displays or high resolutions.

slider.label: Chattext Life Time:
slider.tool_tip: This option sets the amount of time in seconds any local chat remains on screen before starting to fade.
slider.name: NearbyToastLifeTime

slider.label: Chattext Fade Time:
slider.tool_tip: This option sets the amount of time in seconds it takes before chat that started fading is hidden completely.
slider.name: NearbyToastFadingTime

check_box.label: Use Bubble Chat
check_box.tool_tip: This option controls whether chat should be shown as chat bubbles on nametags in addition to the normal chat or not.
check_box.name: bubble_text_chat

slider.label: Bubble Chat Opacity:
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the opacity of the background for chat bubbles and name tags in general.
slider.name: bubble_chat_opacity
